remarks: The image structure of a monoid is a monoid.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
imasmnd.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imasmnd.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imasmnd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
imasmnd.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imasmnd.e $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( a e. V /\ b e. V ) /\ ( p e. V /\ q e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` a ) = ( F ` p ) /\ ( F ` b ) = ( F ` q ) ) -> ( F ` ( a .+ b ) ) = ( F ` ( p .+ q ) ) ) ) $.
imasmnd2.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. W ) $.
imasmnd2.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. V /\ y e. V ) -> ( x .+ y ) e. V ) $.
imasmnd2.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. V /\ y e. V /\ z e. V ) ) -> ( F ` ( ( x .+ y ) .+ z ) ) = ( F ` ( x .+ ( y .+ z ) ) ) ) $.
imasmnd2.3 $e |- ( ph -> .0. e. V ) $.
imasmnd2.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. V ) -> ( F ` ( .0. .+ x ) ) = ( F ` x ) ) $.
imasmnd2.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. V ) -> ( F ` ( x .+ .0. ) ) = ( F ` x ) ) $.
imasmnd2 $p |- ( ph -> ( U e. Mnd /\ ( F ` .0. ) = ( 0g ` U ) ) ) $.
$d .+ p q x y $.
$d .0. p q x $.
$d B p q $.
$d F a b p q x y z $.
$d R p q $.
$d U a b p q x y z $.
$d V a b p q x y z $.
$d a b p ph q x y z $.
